entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
